definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Remove the old faucet and scrape any old putty or caulk from the basin.
sentences.chinese: 拆調舊水龍頭，並颳去洗槽舊的膩子或填充物。

sentences.english: And Rinpoche has vowed to turn off the water while brushing his teeth.
sentences.chinese: 仁波切本身則誓言在刷牙時要關閉水龍頭。

sentences.english: She bent her mouth to the tap and drank the tepid water.
sentences.chinese: 她把嘴伸到水龍頭底下去喝那微溫的水。

sentences.english: The insult to the adult consulter results in multiplication of the faulty faucets.
sentences.chinese: 對成年諮詢者的侮辱導致有缺陷水龍頭成倍增加。

sentences.english: Add low flow aerators to all the faucets in your home.
sentences.chinese: 把你家裏的每個水龍頭都裝上加氣儀。

sentences.english: If there aren’t any leaks, wash up with your new faucet fixture.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有任何漏水，就可以清洗你的新水龍頭了。

sentences.english: The faucets on my kitchen sink are stuck. I can't turn them off.
sentences.chinese: 我廚房水槽上面的水龍頭給卡住了，我關不上。

sentences.english: Then draw water from the lowest faucet in the house.
sentences.chinese: 然後從最低的水龍頭中接水就可以了。

sentences.english: Not only this, you also get the advantage of knowing whether the water is cold or hot.
sentences.chinese: 不僅如此，你還可以通過這款水龍頭知道水的冷熱。

sentences.english: The water falls from the tap drop by drop.
sentences.chinese: 水從水龍頭裏一滴一滴地往下流。

sentences.english: This tap is a bad one, it splashes.
sentences.chinese: 這水龍頭不好，到處濺水。

sentences.english: Afraid of being scolded, the naughty boy ran away without turning off the water.
sentences.chinese: 害怕捱罵，那個淘氣的男孩沒關水龍頭就跑了。

sentences.english: After a check Yu Xiaoji finally fix the faucet.
sentences.chinese: 經過一番檢查餘小奇總算修好了水龍頭。

sentences.english: The moulding characteristics of plastic water-tap were analyzed, and core pulling in circular arc trace was applied to the tap.
sentences.chinese: 分析塑料水龍頭的成型特點，採用了圓弧抽芯。

sentences.english: I need a new bathroom sink faucet .
sentences.chinese: 我需要一個新的浴室洗手檯的水龍頭。

sentences.english: Therefore, faucet is the main essential subject in research of "water-using behavior".
sentences.chinese: 而水龍頭自然就成爲用水行爲研究的主要對象。

definition: power switch/gas valve/to open the city (or frontier) gate/to open and close/to switch on and off
cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
variant of 陽臺|阳台[yang2 tai2]
to receive/to accept/to take in/to hold
